summary:
I am an interim digital consultant who enjoys facing challenges. With my broad marketing background, I focus on developing 9+ journeys for customers. Interim marketer roles: 

▪ Online Marketer
▪ Lead specialist
▪ Digital Channelmanager
▪ Proposition marketer
▪ Digital Specialist
▪ Digital Projectmanager 
▪ Communication Advisor Online
▪ Online Adviseur

Profile: data driven, pragmatic, result oriented, innovative, entrepreneurial, involved, curious, 

Tooling/expertise: SEO,SEA, Link Building, Affiliate marketing, Retargeting, Display advertising, Social Media Marketing, e-mail marketing, Adobe Photoshop, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, HTML, CSS, Jira, Adwords, Google Analytics, Wordpress, Agile, Scrum, Marketing Automation

profile_positions.description:
ABN AMRO aims to improve their digital services to their senior target group, by reducing the barriers to digital acceptance. In addition, the bank aims to improve services for the next of kin in order to retain more capital within the bank. ABN AMRO is looking for a digital marketer who can bring online and offline journies together with a clear focus on the needs of the target group.

▪ Analyze and identify opportunities to develop ppropositions
▪ Proposition validation & national rollout
▪ Digitization of offline processes
▪ Sparringpartner for Dev ops and business

For the senior target group, off and online courses have been developed marketed and launched. For surviving relatives, the reporting process has completely been digitalized and special advice and care journey has been set up.
profile_positions.title: Interim propostion marketer

profile_positions.description:
ABN AMRO's e-commerce and Retail department is switching from a product focuses strategy to a service centered approach for their inside out defined target groups. Therefore, ABN AMRO retail is looking for an all-round marketing specialist who can translate abstract propositions into concrete journeys that create value for the senior and affluent target groups. 

▪ Development of the e-commerce service strategy for seniors
▪ Plotting the strategy as a digital PO
▪ Creating and deploying campaigns
▪ PO digital seniors & sparring partner for  IT and Business

The needs of the target groups have been mapped and translated into an online "senior" store. Where everything from products to online banking courses can be found. Inaddition everything has been designed with keeping the elderly end user in mind. Next to this various online and offline initiatives have been started to improve the bond between the elderly target group and ABN AMRO
profile_positions.title: Interim Online Sales Specialist

profile_positions.description:
More and more local entrepreneurs are finding their way to SEM, which means increasing competition and of course increasing advertising costs. Dutch Parket's online team is looking for a future-proof SEA and SEO strategy with a focus on reducing costs per lead. 

 ▪ Responsible for the development and implementation of the lead strategy
 ▪ Managing marketing agencies and development partners
 ▪ Creating and deploying social campaigns with third parties

With a combination of multiple unique websites and a local SEO strategy for each major city, the quote requests are doubled without increasing SEA costs.
profile_positions.title: Interim Lead Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Without any digital expertise, the bus company Eurolines has continued operational marketing activities for 2 years. This has resulted in rising costs for marketing agencies, a lack of performance insights and the absence of clearly defined marketing strategy. 
 
▪ Responsible for setting up and monitoring the marketing strategy 
▪ Continuing advisory role for the head office in Paris with regard to centralization and standardization
▪ Monitoring and controlling third parties (campaign approval, flow and content) 
▪ Performing customer journey analyzes and trends to optimize multi-channel services 
 
The online marketing activities of Eurolines have been restructured and performance has been made transparent. In addition, the marketing activities are synchronized between both countries (BE&NL). The performance of marketing agencies was also evaluated to achieve better SEA results. This has led to a 35% increase in new visitor numbers and a 17% increase in the conversion ratio. .
profile_positions.title: Interim Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Azerion is one of THE 50 largest online gaming players worldwide and publishes 3 billion advertisements per month. After a successful but aggressive acquisition strategy, the company wants to attract more visitors but also to retain them. 

▪ Contract negotiations with A brands (Disney & King) 
▪ A / B testing of affiliates and optimization 
▪ Planning, delivery and maintenance of advertising partners (Google DFP) 
▪ Positioning and implementing the various web portals 
▪ Trend analyses and advisory role for web / app functionalities to Dev-Ops

Thanks to a clear focus on affiliate partners and positioning, the number of organic visitors has increased by 31%. Also, we managed to attract more paying players (whales) in affiliate products. The functional improvements have led to an increased interaction between users and the web portals
profile_positions.title: All-Round Marketer

profile_positions.description:
KeyGames Network is expanding its online reach by acquiring international gaming portals. The company aims to grow by economies of scale. To maintain and grow online visitors the company needs an all-round campaign marketer. 

•	Display and retargeting campaigns (Google Adwords)
•	Ad trafficker for the largest gaming portals (Google DoubleClick for Advertisers)
•	Advisory role of SEO and SEA to other product groups within the company 
•	Analysing web data and trends and advisory role for new features (Google Analytics)
profile_positions.title: Online campaign Manager

profile_positions.description:
KeyGames Network serves more then 2 million monthly users through their leading Dutch gaming platform, Spele.nl. On top of this the company develops casual games for the international gaming market.  As online marketer I was responsible for the exploitation of the Turkish portals and for the launch campaigns of new games. 

• Ad trafficker for Turkish portals (Google DoubleClick for Advertisers)
• Planning and executing online campaigns (Adwords, Facebook, third parties)
• Contact person for clients and ad networks
• Analyzing web data and trends and advisory role for new features (Google Analytics)
profile_positions.title: Portal Manager

profile_positions.description:
With it's HQ based in Istanbul, Triodor holding delivers high-end software solutions for the European market. As part of their international marketing team  I was responsible for the traffic and content management of the social channels, allowing me to develop the following compentences: 

• Planning and executing social media campagnes 
• Developing social media strategy 
• Analyzing and monitoring traffic from social media channels
profile_positions.title: Marketing Intern
